note.p: Née Mowat. Born in St Andrews, Orkney. Married James Leask Sinclair in 1857. Emigrated to New Zealand, 1865; resided in Auckland and Wellington. Had four children in Britain, and more in New Zealand; a son died on voyage to New Zealand.
Census returns of Scotland 1861 (The National Archives of Scotland: Kirkwall and St Ola 10/13)
